document.full_text: novak djokovic claimed his third atp world tour title in a perfect season by beating top-seeded spaniard rafa nadal 4-6 6-3 6-2 in the final of the indian wells atp tournament on sunday.
document.title: djokovic upsets nadal to win indian wells title
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic claimed his third atp world tour title in a perfect season by beating top-seeded spaniard rafa nadal 4-6 6-3 6-2 in the final of the indian wells atp tournament on sunday.
